  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x76

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x52
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18

          text run at (784,0) width 0 RTL: "| "
        LayoutText {#text} at (784,0) size 0x18
          text run at (784,0) width 0: "a"
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,34) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 586x18
          text run at (0,0) width 417: "The line above should have the letter a partially off screen to the "
          text run at (416,0) width 170: "right of the pipe character."
